alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Brevard County through 445 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Palm Bay. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay and Malabar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
